nodes.text: The 31st Flight was a flight group of Confederate Navy Vulture-class droid starfighters in the service of the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars.

The Confederate Navy's 31st Flight was comprised of olive-green and tan-colored Vulture-class battle droids that—as with the Vulture droids of 28th Flight—had less accurate weapons, but greater defensive capabilities, than the droid starfighters of 72nd Flight or 128th Flight.
The 31st Flight group of droid starfighters fought during the Clone Wars for the Confederacy of Independent Systems.
The 31st Flight was represented by a miniature in the initial release of the Star Wars PocketModel TCG in June 2007.
